mapper.select: SELECT purchase_id, COUNT( 1 ) AS count FROM mall_offer WHERE purchase_id IN #{id} GROUP BY purchase_id

SELECT mo.id, mp.goods_name, mo.price, mo.supply_quantity, mo.publish_time, mo.linkman FROM mall_purchase mp RIGHT JOIN mall_offer mo ON mp.id = mo.purchase_id WHERE mp.user_id = #{user_id} ORDER BY mo.publish_time DESC
